name: Competitiveness Index Revised (CI-R) Survey
description: A short survey designed to assess the desire to win in interpersonal situations.
instructions: For each of the following statements, please indicate whether you agree or disagree with them, and how strongly.
reference: Houston J, Harris P, McIntire S, Francis D. Revising the Competitiveness Index using factor analysis. Psychol Rep. 2002 Feb;90(1):31-4. doi: 10.2466/pr0.2002.90.1.31. PMID: 11899003.
